display_long_description:
Step into the boots of a steam train engineer in the heart of the Wild West.
In Western Rails, you’ll take command of a mighty locomotive and journey across a vast desert frontier filled with dust, sun, and steam. Drive historic steam trains using hands-on VR controls, from throttles and brake levers to firebox doors and water refills.

Explore a rugged open world where you can switch tracks at turnouts, attach and detach wagons, and complete a variety of jobs. Haul heavy cargo across long distances, transport eager passengers to frontier towns, and manage your train’s systems to keep everything running smoothly.

Designed for immersion and accessibility, Western Rails blends authentic steam-era vibes with intuitive VR interaction, offering a uniquely satisfying driving experience. Whether you're a train enthusiast or just love the Wild West, this is your ticket to railroading adventure.
